titleStmt.title: A. B. McGuire et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG6710

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Boonvill Ky
25 July 1865
To his Excellency
Thomas E Bramlet

your petitioners Most respectfully Represent to your Excellence that about the year -- at a Circuit Court in and for Owsy County there was a Judgement rendered against John Angel for $33 for commiting an affry with Moses Carnelisan One of the worst men in the county and since that time was by a man in Owsy Madison the Said Angel has Just returnd out of the survice of the united States and we further represent that Angels Family is in need of all the means he Brought home with him for his family and an execution is now in the hands of the sheriff for Collection in view of all these facts we ask your Excellence to relieve him of the fine going to the Commowealth in duty bound we will Ever pry

Names
A B McGuire co c.
Elkanah Mins clk
W. Ledford
Guy T Pintter
John L Williams
James M Sebastian
Names
Thos Marcum
Alexander Strong
J. P. Hampton
Stephen Stamper
Thos Murrell Jr
Thomas Murell
J C Minter
Andrew Mayes
Giles Mayes

State of Kentucky
County of Owsley } Sct

I A B McGuire clerk of the owsley Circuit Court do certify that the foregoing Petition is what it represents itself to be and that the Signers thereof are citizens of this County in good Standing Witness my hand and Seal this 29th day of July 1865

A B McGuire C O C C
By James M Sebastian D C
OWSLEY CIRCUIT COURT SEAL
KENTUCKY

Owsley Cir Ct
vs
John Angel
$33 --
Breach Peace
21st Sept/65
